src_original: utpādayāmi paramaṃ bodhicittam anuttaram //  yathā traiyadhvikanāthāḥ saṃbodhau kṛtaniścayāḥ //
trividhāṃ śīlaśikṣāṃ ca kuśaladharmasaṃgraham //  sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca pratigṛhṇāmy ahaṃ dṛḍham //
vajraghaṇṭāṃ ca mudrāṃ ca pratigṛhṇāmi tattvataḥ //  ācāryaṃ ca grahīṣyāmi mahāvajrakuloccaye //
caturdānaṃ pradāsyāmi ṣaṭkṛtvā tu dine dine //  mahāratnakule yoge samaye ca manorame //
